CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection dismissed (victim);Violation of Art. 8;Violation of P1-1;Not necessary to examine Art. 14+8 or 14+P1-1;State must introduce remedy within three months;Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - reserved;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant , PERSON , is a NORP national of NORP - Cypriot origin , who was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . The applicant owns property in the area of ORG ( FAC ) , in the fenced - up area of GPE , that she acquired by way of a gift from her mother . In particular , she owns CARDINAL a share in a plot of land ( plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) with buildings thereon , consisting of CARDINAL shop , CARDINAL flat and QUANTITY houses . CARDINAL of the houses was her home , where she lived with her husband and children , whereas the rest of the property was used by members of the family and/or rented out to third parties . Furthermore , the applicant partly owns a plot of land ( plot no . CARDINAL , sheet / plan CARDINAL ) with an orchard ( her share being equivalent to CARDINAL ) . This was registered in her name on DATE . The rest of the property is owned by other members of her family .

CARDINAL . In DATE she was forced by the NORP military forces to leave GPE with her family and abandon their home , property and possessions . Since then she has been prevented from having access to , using and enjoying her home and property , which are under the occupation and the control of the NORP military forces . According to the applicant , only the NORP military forces have access to the fenced - up area of GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE new measures were adopted by the authorities of the “ GPE ” ( “ GPE ” ) regarding crossings from northern to southern GPE and vice versa through specified checkpoints . On DATE the “ ORG of the GPE ” enacted “ PERSON no . NORP ” on compensation for immovable properties located within the boundaries of the “ GPE ” , which entered into force on DATE . On DATE , under LAW ” , an “ Immovable Property , Determination , Evaluation and Compensation Commission ” was established in the “ TRNC ” . The rules of the commission were published in the “ ORG Official Gazette ” on DATE and the commission was constituted by a decision of the “ ORG ” published in the aforementioned gazette on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE CARDINAL separate referendums were held simultaneously in GPE on ORG ( “ LAW ” ) which had been finalised on DATE . Since the plan was approved in the NORP - NORP referendum but not in the NORP - Cypriot referendum , ORG did not enter into force .
